snippet: Twenty-two people were arrested on drug trafficking and other charges during a border-town roundup that woke residents in Anthony with the sounds of helicopters, bangs and screaming.
abstract: Twenty-two people are arrested on drug trafficking and other charges during border-town raid in Anthony, NM.
lead_paragraph: Twenty-two people were arrested on drug trafficking and other charges during a border-town roundup that woke residents in Anthony with the sounds of helicopters, bangs and screaming.

headline.main: New Mexico: F.B.I. Stages Drug Raid
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: F.B.I. Stages Drug Raid
